name: Waifu Love
description:
Waifu Love is a casual puzzle game where you need to play puzzles like clicker, match game etc.


* 10 original waifus

* 3 tasks to unlock uncensored pic and animation (of the same pic) of each girl

* Good soundtrack

* Full HD (1920x1080p)

* 10 achievements

Artwork Commands:


Mouse scroll up/down = zoom in/out

Animation Commands:


right arrow: 200% speed

left arrow : 100% speed

ESC: close animation

Cheat Mode:


Press "C" to finish the lvl that you're playing.

Disclaimer: All characters are over 18 years old.
